appendix.title: Package Rationale - MIPS
appendix.para: This is the explanation for the inclusion of MIPS-specific packages.

listitem.para: An SGI Multi-bootloader. Able to bootload many different SGI Systems.
A replacement bootloader for the Cobalt MIPS based Raq/Qube? servers.
Dvhtool is the tool responsible for writing MIPS kernel(s) into the SGI volume header.
